import requests
import json
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, crc32

# Fetch from API
launchpad_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launchpads"
response = requests.get(launchpad_url)
launchpad_data = response.json()

# Convert Python list/dict → Spark RDD → Spark DataFrame
rdd = spark.sparkContext.parallelize(launchpad_data)
df_dim_launchpads = spark.read.json(rdd)

# Drop and rename columns
df_dim_launchpads = (
    df_dim_launchpads
    .drop("images", "launches", "timezone", "rockets")  # remove nested + unused
    .withColumnRenamed("id", "launchpad_id")
    .withColumnRenamed("name", "launchpad_name")
    .withColumnRenamed("status", "launchpad_status")

# Reorder columns
cols = df_dim_launchpads.columns
new_cols = ["launchpad_id"] + [c for c in cols if c != "launchpad_id"]
df_dim_launchpads.columns = df_dim_launchpads.columns.select(new_cols)

# Hash the ID column
df_dim_launchpads = df_dim_launchpads.withColumn("launchpad_id", crc32(col("launchpad_id")))
display(df_dim_launchpads)

# Fetch from API
launchpad_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/landpads"
response = requests.get(launchpad_url)
landhpad_data = response.json()

# Convert Python list/dict → Spark RDD → Spark DataFrame
rdd = spark.sparkContext.parallelize(landpad_data)
df_dim_landpads = spark.read.json(rdd)

# Drop and rename columns
df_dim_landpads = (
    df_dim_landpads
    .drop("launches", "wikipedia", "images.large")  # remove nested + unused
    .withColumnRenamed("id", "landpad_id")
    .withColumnRenamed("name", "landpad_name")
    .withColumnRenamed("type", "landpad_type")

# Reorder columns
cols = df_dim_landpads.columns
new_cols = ["landpad_id"] + [c for c in cols if c != "landpad_id"]
df_dim_landpads.columns = df_dim_landpads.columns.select(new_cols)

# Hash the ID column
df_dim_landpads = df_dim_landpads.withColumn("landpad_id", crc32(col("landpad_id")))

df_rockets = pd.json_normalize(rocket_data)
df_dim_rockets = df_rockets[['name', 'type', 'active', 'stages', 'boosters', 'cost_per_launch', 'success_rate_pct', 'first_flight', 'country', 'company', 'description', 'id']]
df_dim_rockets = df_dim_rockets.rename(columns={'id': 'rocket_id', 'type': 'rocket_type'})

# Reorder columns
cols = df_dim_rockets.columns
new_cols = ["rocket_id"] + [c for c in cols if c != "rocket_id"]
df_dim_rockets = df_dim_rockets[new_cols]

spark_dim_rockets = spark.createDataFrame(df_dim_rockets)
spark_dim_rockets = spark_dim_rockets.withColumn('rocket_id', crc32('rocket_id'))
spark_dim_rockets.write.saveAsTable("dim_rockets")
display(spark_dim_rockets)
